iview::ITouchable Class Reference

This interface describes all untransparent GUI objects, which can be touched. More...

Detailed Description

This interface describes all untransparent GUI objects, which can be touched.

Definition at line 17 of file ITouchable.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iview::ITouchable::TouchState

Enumeration for possible shape touch states.

Enumerator:
TS_NONE 

Nothing is touched.

TS_INACTIVE 

Inactive element is touched.

TS_TICKER 

Ticker is touched.

TS_DRAGGABLE 

Draggable element is touched.

TS_OTHER 

Other element is touched.

TS_LAST 

Last value in this enum.

Definition at line 24 of file ITouchable.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual TouchState iview::ITouchable::IsTouched ( istd::CIndex2d  position) const [pure virtual]

Check, if any shape is touched.

When shape is touched, it return also pointer to this shape.

Returns:
touch state for the shape, or iview::IInteractiveShape::TS_NONE, when nothing found.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, iview::ISelectableLayer, iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape< SegmentData >, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangle, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::TInteractiveMultiPolylineShape< SegmentData >, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusSegmentShape, iview::CInteractivePolylineShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, and iview::CInteractivePerspectiveCalibrationShape.
